listFeatures.title: Manage Your Data
listFeatures.text: Use the Wordpress Admin for easy customization and creation for both you and your clients.

listFeatures.title: No Setup Needed
listFeatures.text: Your site and API will be ready-to-go the moment you signup so you can focus on your project.

listFeatures.title: Custom Post Types
listFeatures.text: Create as many custom post types as you want. They are automatically availble in the API.

listFeatures.title: Fully Secured
listFeatures.text: All sites are HTTPS and secured by SSL certificates.

listFeatures.title: Continuous Integration
listFeatures.text: Trigger Netlify builds from within your WordPress admin.

listFeatures.title: Add Additional Users
listFeatures.text: Add other admin users to your site. This is great for collarbation with a team or sites built for clients.
